nodes.text: The Mission to Pijal was a mission undertaken by Jedi Master Qui-Gon Jinn and Padawan Obi-Wan Kenobi to mediate the signing of the Governance Treaty between the Pijali monarchy and Czerka Arms on the Inner Rim planet Pijal around 40 BBY.

The mission to Pijal appears in the 2019 novel Master & Apprentice, written by Claudia Gray. Ultimate Star Wars, New Edition, a reference book published later that year, first identified the Mission to Pijal as capitalized.
